function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Existing technological, sociological, and operational barriers may hinder the impact of digital-health technologies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases within the group of contributors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential
